languages.text: {n}Бывшие слуги и серфы Омниссии, ныне пребывающие в рядах моторных вандалов, счастливы были очистить себя в глазах Деус Механикус эффективным сотрудничеством. Простой люд не посмел осудить сей союз, побоявшись грозных священников в алом.{/n}

{n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бывшие слуги и серфы Омниссии, ныне пребывающие в рядах моторных вандалов, счастливы были очистить себя в глазах Деус Механикус эффективным сотрудничеством. Простой люд не посмел осудить сей союз, побоявшись грозных священников в алом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were happy to clear themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus with their effective collaboration. The common folk did not dare to judge this union, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet red.{/n}

{n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were happy to clear themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus with their effective collaboration. The common folk did not dare to judge this union, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet red.{/n}

{n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}

{n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}

{n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在引擎破坏者之中，欧姆尼塞亚那些曾经的追随者很乐意达成合作，在万机之神的注视下积极进行自我救赎。普通成员畏惧这些身穿猩红衣服的教士，不敢谴责他们与行商浪人达成同盟关系。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在引擎破坏者之中，欧姆尼塞亚那些曾经的追随者很乐意达成合作，在万机之神的注视下积极进行自我救赎。普通成员畏惧这些身穿猩红衣服的教士，不敢谴责他们与行商浪人达成同盟关系。{/n}
{n}在引擎破坏者之中，欧姆尼塞亚那些曾经的追随者很乐意达成合作，在万机之神的注视下积极进行自我救赎。普通成员畏惧这些身穿猩红衣服的教士，不敢指摘他们与行商浪人达成同盟关系。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los antiguos siervos del Omnissiah que ahora forman parte de los Vándalos del Motor se mostraron más que dispuestos a colaborar activamente y redimirse a los ojos del Deus Mechanicus. El pueblo llano no se atrevió a condenar este pacto, temeroso de los amenazadores sacerdotes vestidos de escarlata.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los antiguos siervos del Omnissiah que ahora forman parte de los Vándalos del Motor se mostraron más que dispuestos a colaborar activamente y redimirse a los ojos del Deus Mechanicus. El pueblo llano no se atrevió a condenar este pacto, temeroso de los amenazadores sacerdotes vestidos de escarlata.{/n}

languages.text: {n}現在、エンジン破壊者の一員となっている万機神の元従者や農奴は、積極的に協力し、デウス・メカニクスに対して自分たちの汚名を返上することを喜んでいた。庶民は、緋色の衣をまとった恐ろしい司祭たちを恐れて、この結束に加わる判断を下す勇気がなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}現在、エンジン破壊者の一員となっている万機神の元従者や農奴は、積極的に協力し、デウス・メカニクスに対して自分たちの汚名を返上することを喜んでいた。庶民は、緋色の衣をまとった恐ろしい司祭たちを恐れて、この結束に加わる判断を下す勇気がなかった。{/n}
{n}現在、エンジン破壊者の一員となっている万機神の元従者や農奴は、積極的に協力し、デウス・メカニクスに対して自分たちの汚名を返上することを喜んでいた。庶民は、緋色の衣をまとった恐ろしい司祭たちを恐れて、この結束に加わる判断を下す勇気がなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les anciens serfs et serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, désormais membres des Vandales mécaniques, ont été reconnaissants de collaborer activement et de se repentir vis-à-vis du Deus Mechanicus. La population n'a pas osé condamner ce pacte, craignant les menaces des prêtres vêtus de rouge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les anciens serfs et serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, désormais membres des Vandales mécaniques, ont été reconnaissants de collaborer activement et de se repentir vis-à-vis du Deus Mechanicus. La population n'a pas osé condamner ce pacte, craignant les menaces des prêtres vêtus de rouge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die ehemaligen Diener und Sklaven des Omnissiah, die nun Teil der Maschinenvandalen sind, haben aktiv kooperiert, um sich die Erlösung des Deus Mechanicus zu verdienen. Das gemeine Volk wagte es nicht, über diesen Pakt zu urteilen, da es die bedrohlichen Priester in ihren roten Roben zu sehr fürchtete.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die ehemaligen Diener und Sklaven des Omnissiah, die nun Teil der Maschinenvandalen sind, haben aktiv kooperiert, um sich die Erlösung des Deus Mechanicus zu verdienen. Das gemeine Volk wagte es nicht, über diesen Pakt zu urteilen, da es die bedrohlichen Priester in ihren roten Roben zu sehr fürchtete.{/n}

{n}Die ehemaligen Diener und Sklaven des Omnissiah, die nun Teil der Maschinenvandalen sind, haben sehr bereitwillig kooperiert, um sich die Erlösung des Deus Mechanicus zu verdienen. Das gemeine Volk wagte es nicht, über diese Union zu urteilen, da es die bedrohlichen Priester in ihren roten Roben zu sehr fürchtete.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şimdilerde Makinenin Vandalları mensubu olan eski Hermesih hizmetkârları ile köleleri, etkin olarak iş birliği yapıp Deus Mechanicus'un gözünde günahlarından arınabildikleri için memnun oldular. Sıradan halk, kızıla bürünmüş tehditkâr rahiplerin korkusuyla bu ittifakı kınamaya cüret edemedi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former servants and serfs of the Omnissiah that are now a part of the Engine Vandals were glad to actively collaborate and redeem themselves in the eyes of the Deus Mechanicus. The common folk did not dare condemn this pact, fearing the menacing priests clad in scarlet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Şimdilerde Makinenin Vandalları mensubu olan eski Hermesih hizmetkârları ile köleleri, etkin olarak iş birliği yapıp Deus Mechanicus'un gözünde günahlarından arınabildikleri için memnun oldular. Sıradan halk, kızıla bürünmüş tehditkâr rahiplerin korkusuyla bu ittifakı kınamaya cüret edemedi.{/n}
